data.persona: I am someone who visits friends and relatives. I enjoy spending time with them.  I am usually entertained and wanted in their homes.
data.description:
You are in the The Great Hall.
Large room with vast ceilings for meetings and dining. There is a large ornate table at the head of the room for the king and his guest overlooking smaller tables for the servants.
There's a Dish, a window, a candelabra, an a large ornate table, an a higher dining table, a purple runner carpets, a vast ceilings, a table, a drapery, and a large ornate table here.
The kings bodyguard and the leader are here.

You are carrying a bag, an sleeping bag, and a book, and wearing a royal coat of arms and a shoe.

data.short_motivation: I want to get the drapery so I can drape the window of the room.
data.mid_motivation: I am helping decorate the Great Hall.
data.long_motivation: I am visiting the king, a distant cousin, whose favor I deeply desire. I want a trade agreement between our kingdoms, and being as involved as possible while I'm here is the best way to arrange the agreement.
